name: Good Luck, Minutes Man!
description:
Welcome to New L'manburg! 

Your name is Ranboo. You're the nation's official minutes man, and you have a very long day ahead of you. 

This visual novel contains:

  • 1-2 hours of gameplay 
  • 5 unique endings, plus an unlockable secret ending
  • Interactions with your favorite characters from season 2 of the Dream SMP

This is a fan work. While it is in line with canon events, it is not a one to one depiction of the official Dream SMP storyline.
